| An Uruk-captain:* has [a head, a couple of arms, and a torso](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid").
* is [omnivorous](/wiki/Omnivore "Omnivore").
* is not a valid [polymorphable](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph") form.
* is a [human](/wiki/Human_\(monster_attribute\) "Human (monster attribute)").
* is an orc.
* is a [lord to its kind](/wiki/M2_LORD "M2 LORD").
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* [likes gold](/wiki/Gold_lover "Gold lover").
* likes gems.
* can pick up weapons and food.
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* may [turn against you](/wiki/Treachery "Treachery") when tame. |                                                                                       |

An **Uruk-captain**, o, is a type of [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") that appears in [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") and [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack"). An Uruk-captain is a type of [orc](/wiki/Orc_\(monster_class\) "Orc (monster class)") that is the [Uruk-hai](/wiki/Uruk-hai "Uruk-hai") equivalent of the [orc-captain](/wiki/Orc-captain "Orc-captain"), sharing similar statlines and the ability to [twoweapon](/wiki/Twoweapon "Twoweapon") - however, the Uruk-captain is faster with stronger attacks, and is both [orcish](/wiki/Orc_\(monster_attribute\) "Orc (monster attribute)") and [human](/wiki/Human_\(monster_attribute\) "Human (monster attribute)") as with other Uruk-hai in dNetHack and notdNetHack.

An Uruk-captain has a weapon attack and an offhand weapon attack, and possesses [poison resistance](/wiki/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance") and [stoning resistance](/wiki/Stoning_resistance "Stoning resistance").

Eating an Uruk-captain [corpse](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse") or [tin](/wiki/Tin "Tin") can convey poison resistance or temporary stoning resistance.

## Generation

Randomly generated Uruk-captains are created among a group of Uruk-hai. An Uruk-hai can [grow up](/wiki/Grow_up "Grow up") into an Uruk-captain.

A hostile Uruk-captain may appear as the ruler of a [throne room](/wiki/Throne_room#dNetHack "Throne room").

An Uruk-captain [can be generated with](/wiki/Monster_starting_inventory "Monster starting inventory") the same equipment as an Uruk-hai: a 1⁄3 chance of an [orcish cloak](/wiki/Orcish_cloak "Orcish cloak"), a 1⁄3 chance of an [orcish short sword](/wiki/Orcish_short_sword "Orcish short sword"), a 1⁄3 chance of an [Uruk-hai shield](/wiki/Uruk-hai_shield "Uruk-hai shield"), and a 1⁄3 chance of a [pair of shoes](/wiki/Pair_of_shoes "Pair of shoes"). They may also generate with a [drum](/wiki/Drum "Drum"), along with a [crossbow](/wiki/Crossbow "Crossbow") and a set of [crossbow bolts](/wiki/Crossbow_bolt "Crossbow bolt").

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Uruk-captain\&action=edit)*

[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")
html:
Uruk-captain

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
o Uruk-captain (No tile)
Difficulty 7
Attacks Weapon 1d10 physical, Offhand Weapon 1d10 physical
o Uruk-captain (No tile)
Difficulty 7
Attacks

Weapon 1d10 physical, Offhand Weapon 1d10 physical

Base level 5
Base experience 84
Speed 12
Base AC 10
Base MR 0
Alignment 4 (lawful)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 1350
Nutritional value 350
Size medium
Resistances poison, petrification
Resistances conveyed poison, petrification

An Uruk-captain:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is a human.
  • is an orc.
  • is a lord to its kind.
  • is strong.
  • likes gold.
  • likes gems.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • may turn against you when tame.

An Uruk-captain, o, is a type of monster that appears in dNetHack and notdNetHack. An Uruk-captain is a type of orc that is the Uruk-hai equivalent of the orc-captain, sharing similar statlines and the ability to twoweapon - however, the Uruk-captain is faster with stronger attacks, and is both orcish and human as with other Uruk-hai in dNetHack and notdNetHack.

An Uruk-captain has a weapon attack and an offhand weapon attack, and possesses poison resistance and stoning resistance.

Eating an Uruk-captain corpse or tin can convey poison resistance or temporary stoning resistance.

Generation

Randomly generated Uruk-captains are created among a group of Uruk-hai. An Uruk-hai can grow up into an Uruk-captain.

A hostile Uruk-captain may appear as the ruler of a throne room.

An Uruk-captain can be generated with the same equipment as an Uruk-hai: a 1⁄3 chance of an orcish cloak, a 1⁄3 chance of an orcish short sword, a 1⁄3 chance of an Uruk-hai shield, and a 1⁄3 chance of a pair of shoes. They may also generate with a drum, along with a crossbow and a set of crossbow bolts.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.

An '''Uruk-captain''', {{white|o}}, is a type of [[monster]] that appears in [[dNetHack]] and [[notdNetHack]]. An Uruk-captain is a type of [[Orc (monster class)|orc]] that is the [[Uruk-hai]] equivalent of the [[orc-captain]], sharing similar statlines and the ability to [[twoweapon]] - however, the Uruk-captain is faster with stronger attacks, and is both [[Orc (monster attribute)|orcish]] and [[Human (monster attribute)|human]] as with other Uruk-hai in dNetHack and notdNetHack.

An Uruk-captain has a weapon attack and an offhand weapon attack, and possesses [[poison resistance]] and [[stoning resistance]].

Eating an Uruk-captain [[corpse]] or [[tin]] can convey poison resistance or temporary stoning resistance.

==Generation==
Randomly generated Uruk-captains are created among a group of Uruk-hai. An Uruk-hai can [[grow up]] into an Uruk-captain.

A hostile Uruk-captain may appear as the ruler of a [[Throne room#dNetHack|throne room]].

An Uruk-captain [[Monster starting inventory|can be generated with]] the same equipment as an Uruk-hai: a {{frac|3}} chance of an [[orcish cloak]], a {{frac|3}} chance of an [[orcish short sword]], a {{frac|3}} chance of an [[Uruk-hai shield]], and a {{frac|3}} chance of a [[pair of shoes]].<!--Ask riker and co. about the goodequip shit later.--> They may also generate with a [[drum]], along with a [[crossbow]] and a set of [[crossbow bolt]]s.
